title: TheBeardedBaby
author: TheBeardedBaby
content: Hello guys, As the subject says, who is owning the epochtalk.com and why it is down now? Last time I checked was working fine.On the other hand, I see there's a lot of activity going on on the development side, which is good.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Not sure who owns it, but this is all I could get about itThe archive links try to show how the website looked like back thenSnapshot from 24 Sept 2016 - https://archive.is/0guTCSnapshot from 5th Nov 2016 - https://web.archive.org/web/20161105010735/http://epochtalk.com/

comments.author: Rizzrack
comments.body: Seems both of them, .com and .org , belong to Slickage.https://github.com/epochtalkMust have registered both and started recently also using the .com one.Might be a good sign

comments.author: TheBeardedBaby
comments.body: Quote from: Rizzrack on January 29, 2023, 07:19:17 PMSeems both of them, .com and .org , belong to Slickage.https://github.com/epochtalkMust have registered both and started recently also using the .com one.Might be a good signÂ   Yeah, this is where I saw it.I forgot about the.... .org one i guess that was the original one I've visited before.
